name: Michael C. WARD, petitioner, v. Cathleen STODDARD, Warden, et al.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Michael C. WARD, petitioner,
v.
Cathleen STODDARD, Warden, et al.

opinions.text: Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperisdenied, and petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of Appeals of Michigan dismissed. See Rule 39.8.
